::Battera::

She was in the water, kicking at the sharkticons as the swam closer 
to her.  She  yelled at Vulois,"Vulois, forgive me. Please!"
He only laughed at her. 

In her sleep, she muttered, "forgive me."

She screamed as one sharkticon came up from under her and bit down on 
her wing. She was thrashes around and she screamed out in terror as  
she saw the water around her become streaked with her mech fluid.  



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::CyberShark::
> 
>     He had enough. Battera was in trouble, he needed to help her. 
He reached over to Vulois and yanked the cable out of his head. He 
used his scanner again on them both, and hoped they would wake up all 
right.
